title: The Fox Montage | AHS: Double Feature - Episode 1: "Cape Fear" (HQ Clip)
author: AHS Crave
comment:
She plays beautifully. 
I have played for 30 years and it grates my nerves when parents think their kid playing an instrument is just bothersome noise. 
He could just get noise canceling headphones.
Superb direction and editing! I feel like, so far, Red Tide could really help set a new standard for future AHS seasons.
I love the violin. Definitely My favorite instrument.
The editing is awesome. The music is haunting. Keep the great work going and next year will see AHS DF nominated for best miniseries at Emmy.

Nice f**king music!!!!!!!
Alma plays Freaking good!
description: "Cape Fear", the season premiere of American Horror Story: Double Feature (Part 1 - Red Tide) - written by Ryan Murphy & Brad Falchuk, directed by John J. Gray - stars Sarah Paulson as Tuberculosis Karen, Evan Peters as Austin Sommers, Lily Rabe as Doris Gardener, Finn Wittrock as Harry Gardener, Ryan Kiera Armstrong as Alma Gardener, Frances Conroy as Belle Noir, Billie Lourd as Lark, Leslie Grossman as Ursula, Adina Porter as Chief Burelson, Angelica Ross as The Chemist, Macaulay Culkin as Mickey, Denis O'Hare as Holden, and Robin Weigert as Martha. All rights belong to FX Networks and Ryan Murphy Television.
